description: Detects nltest commands that can be used for information discovery
author: Craig Young
oscd.community
Georg Lauenstein
false_positives: Legitimate administration use but user must be check out
name: Potential Recon Activity Via Nltest.EXE
query: (((process.executable.text:*\\nltest.exe) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"nltestrk.exe")) AND (((process.command_line.text:*\/server* AND process.command_line.text:*\/query*)) OR (process.command_line.text:(*\/dclist\:* OR *\/parentdomain* OR *\/domain_trusts* OR *\/trusted_domains* OR *\/user*))))
